onboarding.title: Welcome to SlimeTora!
onboarding.welcome: SlimeTora is a middleware program that allows you to connect your HaritoraX trackers to the SlimeVR server, bypassing the official software!
onboarding.setup: Please select how you would like to setup SlimeTora. After you have set up the program, you will be guided on how to set up SlimeVR server.

about.title: About SlimeTora
about.description: The SlimeTora project is a middleware program that allows you to connect the HaritoraX trackers to the SlimeVR server.
